title: Remove simplejson
raw_output: Issue 3555 proposes removing simplejson dependency from Flask. This affects the JSON module, setup configuration, and documentation. Predicted files: (1) src/flask/json/__init__.py - the JSON module that imports/uses simplejson. (2) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry for the breaking change. (3) setup.cfg - dependency configuration that references simplejson. (4) tests/test_basic.py - tests that may reference simplejson behavior. Exploration: The current predictions included setup.cfg, setup.py, docs/api.rst, and docs/installation.rst. Keeping the most impactful files within the 3-5 target range.
